projects.title: DevProjectPlanner
projects.description: A project management application built with TypeScript, React, MaterialUI, and FireBase. Includes Task Manager, Bug Tracker, and Note Cards. Full CRUD and authentication used. At this time you need a GitHub account in order to log in to the live project.

projects.title: Coffeeroasters Site
projects.description: A code challenge from Front End Mentor. A website for a fictitious coffee subscriptions service. Was provided with a design document and built the page with HTML JavaScript and TailwindCSS.
